long_description: With full visibility in every direction, the Ticla TeaHouse 3 Tent begs the question: Why drive to a beautiful landscape and then pitch a tent from which you can't see a thing?. Car campers who like views and ventilation will enjoy full visibility, kid- and dog-friendly durability, a spacious floor plan and a storage tote that's easy to pack. Awning-style rainfly provides excellent coverage without compromising views or ventilation. Strong and smooth shock-corded aluminum poles withstand the elements. The Ticla TeaHouse 3 Tent fits in a 10 x 15 ft. space, making it perfect for festivals and small campsites.
short_description: With full visibility in every direction, the Ticla TeaHouse 3 Tent begs the question: Why drive to a beautiful landscape and then pitch a tent from which you can't see a thing?.
